message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"week; also means 'Sunday' in some contexts","sentence":"星期在学校。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation of a school building under a surreal sky, with a large calendar page showing '星期' (week) hanging on the wall in the foreground, blending subtle end-of-world elements with a peaceful school scene.","sentence_translation":"Week is at the school."}
